article_title: Macron leads ceremony for French victims of Hamas
sentence: A  total  of  42  French  and  dual  French-Israeli  nationals  were  killed  on  7  October,  and  six  were  injured.

article_title: Macron leads ceremony for French victims of Hamas
sentence: The  7  October  attack  was  the  largest  slaughter  of  French  nationals  since  the  July  2016  Bastille  Day  attack  in  the  southern  city  of  Nice,  in  which  86  people  were  killed  when  a  truck  drove  into  crowds  ,  externalcelebrating  Bastille  Day.

article_title: Macron leads ceremony for French victims of Hamas
sentence: Around  1,200  people  were  killed  during  the  Hamas  attacks  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October  last  year.

article_title: Macron leads ceremony for French victims of Hamas
sentence: More  than  27,500  Palestinians  have  been  killed  and  at  least  65,000  wounded  by  the  war  launched  by  Israel  in  response,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
